title: vAgadIshvari
sahitya:
vAgadIshvari varakavi yOgigaL koNDADum


anupallavi

  vEgamAna Ukamum vivEkamum kalai mOhamum aruL


caraNam    villum kaNaiyum viralum koNDa vIran pOla veTri peTra
shollum poruLum shuDarum arivum nalla kanavum ninaivum aruLi
ellaiyaTra shaktiyAga enadu vAkkai Ukkuginra
